reportProtocol.title: User Experience Improvement Plan
reportProtocol.content:
To improve your experience, continuously discover and fix issues, this feature will automatically upload anonymous information. These include:

ğŸ“Œ Program exceptions: such as crashes, error codes, etc.
ğŸ“Œ Performance data: such as download speed, operation response time, and feature usage frequency (anonymous).

This process never collects or uploads any personally identifiable information, file contents, chat records, passwords, or browsing history.

You can disable this protocol at any time in Settings.

updateTips.title: Version Update Introduction
updateTips.content:
ğŸ“Œ New AI Mark feature: Let AI remember any file for you, so you can find files faster later, or ask questions.
ğŸ“Œ OCR feature: To save computer resources, visual indexing is now provided by OCR service: it only extracts text from images, no longer uses AI models to summarize images. If needed, you can use AI Mark on images.
ğŸ“Œ Added right-click menu: You can right-click on search results to use AI Mark.

aiMark.title: Or you need AI Mark
aiMark.requireTitle: AI Mark requires the following components
aiMark.successTitle: Congratulations! AI Mark is now enabled

step1.entry: Open AI Mark from right-click menu
step1.desc: You can let AI mark this file. AI understands and analyzes the document. With AI's understanding, you can find this file more easily:
step1.understand: ğŸ§  Understand: With AI understanding, you can locate this file faster and more easily.
step1.summaryImage: ğŸ–¼ï¸ Image summary: Truly understand image content, not just OCR.
step1.ask: ğŸ“– Ask questions: You can ask questions about the document (coming soon).

step2.cuda: CUDA Service (optional: GPU acceleration, available if your PC has GPU)
step2.tips:
ğŸ“Œ Download takes about 5â€“10 minutes (depending on your network). You can still use other features during download.
ğŸ“Œ Internet connection required during download

step3.done: Try right-clicking the file and choose AI Mark. AI will now remember your file! (CUDA service takes effect after restart)
